text: Kalyana Rekhe () is a 1993 Indian Kannada language film directed by M. S. Rajashekar and produced by M. Sadanand under the banner Yamini Pictures. The film stars Malashri and Shashikumar in the lead roles. The supporting cast features Shubha, K. S. Ashwath, Thoogudeepa Srinivas, Girija Lokesh, Tennis Krishna and Doddanna. Acclaimed director S. K. Bhagavan was also a part of star cast in supporting role. The film was based on the novel written by Sai Suthe == Cast == * Malashri * Shashikumar * Thoogudeepa Srinivas * Shubha * Doddanna * K. S. Ashwath * Sundar Krishna Urs * S. K. Bhagavan * Girija Lokesh * Ashalatha * M. S. Umesh ==Soundtrack== Hamsalekha composed the music for the film and wrote lyrics and the soundtracks. The album consists of six soundtracks. == References == Category:1993 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Kannada-language films Category:Films directed by M. S. Rajashekar Category:Films scored by Hamsalekha Category:Films based on Indian novels
title: Kalyana Rekhe
